CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(TEXT( Product__r.Customer_Subscription_Type__c )='kWh', Change_in_Annual_kWh__c!=0),
Change_in_Annual_kWh__c/ Expected_Yield_kWh_kW__c ,
IF( Utility_Account_Subscription__r.UAS_Number__c > 1 ,
Change_in_Annual_Cost__c / Value_of_NMC__c / Expected_Yield_kWh_kW__c,
IF(
OR( Utility_Account_Subscription__r.Auto_Unround__c = TRUE , Utility_Account_Subscription__r.UAS_Number__c = 1),
Change_in_Annual_Cost__c / Value_of_NMC__c/Expected_Yield_kWh_kW__c,
IF(
OR(Utility_Account_Subscription__r.UAS_Number__c=1, Utility_Account_Subscription__r.Shared_Solar_System__r.Name = 'Fairhaven Mill Rd',
Utility_Account_Subscription__r.Shared_Solar_System__r.Name= 'Oxford Clara Barton'),
Round(( Change_in_Annual_Cost__c / Value_of_NMC__c/Expected_Yield_kWh_kW__c) * 4, 0)/4,0))))
CustomField.label: XCalculated Change in Subscription KW DC
